posts.post_text: June 6, 2014 at 2:48 PM#2try something like this to change page:(e.g. page 2)Assign UserProfile "*"."usersettings" /currentbuttonpage=2 /currentfaderpage=2Be aware that changing pages via editing userprofile properties, will only work for existing pages (only changing pages via the Page keyword will create new pages if the don't exist)
